5p3aG6o--DocmyPBPolAsQ.text: Excellent meal, excellent service. GREAT FLAVORS! The Mac n cheese is great as was the bacon wrapped jalapeno.  Probably not cardiologist approved.... If you like BBQ this is a must! The Pecan cobbler was a great way to finish off the meal.  Parking is scarce though.

photos.caption: Photo of Midwood Smokehouse - Charlotte, NC, United States

U9kJDn4Y7kpqLEe0zk-nHw.text: Amazing. Burnt tips are like nothing I've ever had. Also sampled my wife's grilled cheese  (with pork), which was awesome.   Good local craft beer selection as well, and our waiter was really helpful and attentive.   Terrific lunch experience!

lWEgW1rHsVmHqig3nipoOQ.text: Holy f-ing sh*t this place is amazing.  Right from walking in I was in heaven with how good it smelled, then when we got our food. Everything was perfect. Our server Tom was a wonderful super friendly and attentive. Everything on the menu looked fantastic. We got the combo plate with everything but the ribs (it was an hour before closing and they're super popular) the sausage was perfect, chopped pork was heavenly, pulled chicken fantastic and the brisket was phenomenal. Mac and cheese is bombdiggity and their hush puppies are 100% my favorite hush puppies ever.  The pecan cobbler WITH ice cream is definitely not to be missed either.  We just moved to the area and this is hands down our favorite place that will be a regular spot for us :)

Fest5qW2mCGCjaHek76BZQ.text: The food is delicious. If you're not big on vinegar based BBQ sauce, try their house made sauce. The greens, Mac and cheese and hush puppies are delicious!!

L7CpUTAdEaL83t9fb8hP0g.text: Being from Arizona I am not qualified to rate NC BBQ. This was the only BBQ joint we tried while visiting. It was so good!   We had the brisket, burned bits, and the pulled pork. Everything tasted amazing. We did have to wait about an hour to get seated on a Saturday night, but since we were on vacation we didn't mind. I really wanted to try dessert but I was so full I couldn't eat anything else. I will return to Arizona and dream of returning to have more NC BBQ!!!

YlRKqzDcijD4wsT3tyUlqw.text: Pretty good! We were on the prowl for quality 'cue and chose to visit Midwood Smokehouse. Our server was friendly and prompt and made good recommendations. We got half price local beers--the Bad Penny is a Tasty Deal--and split the "Choose 4" platter between the two of us with a few bites to spare. With three beers and lunch for two, it was $30 (not incl. tip). A fair deal!  I'm not always a sausage fan, but their version is packed with flavor and nice and moist. I also can't stand mustard, but I swear this version with the sausage tasted like tangy cream sauce. The beef brisket was one of the more tender, flavorful versions I've had, and paired with their brown sugary house sauce, all I can compare it to is Christmas.  Mac n' cheese was just dandy, and the fries were hot and crispy.   Hush puppies were well done, but would have been phenomenal with a side of honey.  All in all, a good barbecue place we will visit again.

MNv5uIQgapl4dSJZllS5sQ.text: Very good , and smokey pork , cole slaw and hush pups were kind of average . Baco wrapped stuffed Jalapenos were crazy good with the special Bloody Mary !

photos.caption: Photo of Midwood Smokehouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. Cheesy Baco wrapped hickory smoked jalapeño goodness!
Photo of Midwood Smokehouse - Charlotte, NC, United States. True that !

2PKFM9fFwv3wdExduQzyKA.text: Brisket is awesome great atmosphere super friendly staff

CmlK64lE1fmLWiX5EA-ccw.text: I visited this place based on the yelp reviews  Y'ALL TRICKED ME highly disappointed after at 30 minute wait for a simple BBQ sandwich.  The bbq was more like smoked pork with no flavor. I felt as I'd they made my sandwich from left over meat from 3 Days ago.    I had to pour on the extra sauce to keep from choking off the thick dry bun.  Eeeewww

yQUVCwxDz9SYje1a-Bef8A.text: This is my favorite place to get BBQ in Charlotte. The meat has a great flavor, the sides are always delicious (bacon wrapped jalapenos, mac n' cheese, pickled onions, hushpuppies) and they always have a good selection of local beer on draft. My husband and I recently ordered a salad from here as to have a lighter meal and WOW! I had no idea a salad could be that tasty. The waiters are always very friendly and helpful. I've probably been here more than 10 times and have never had a bad experience. The food is always on point and consistent.

ymNwmCVLsyVRfvptZiDjlg.text: My boyfriend and I went to midwood tonight and both got the Carolina pork with the NC sauce and midwood signature sauce. He got a side of Mac and cheese and I got the creamed corn. Everything was overly salty. When the manager came to inquire how our meal was, we politely let her know everything was overly seasoned. She switched my corn for the collard greens but they ended up being salty as well. She also brought out another plate of pork from another batch. Luckily this was not salty. The waitress also gave us complimentary desserts. I've been here before and thought everything was delicious. I don't know why everything was so salty but the service was decent except for the wait. Overall we were there for more than an hour.

gYxIRX_rbjzgUcowcM1SwA.text: We came in from Orlando for the night and yelped the best BBQ in Charlotte. This place did not disappoint. The carolina pork was phenomenal and the large plate was more then filing. All the sides were awesome. Between my girlfriend and i we had mac n cheese, jalapenos, baked beans, and the smoked veggied. All were awesome. They also have a great beer and cocktail selection!

eaI5i9AZbBkMNE82pSADIQ.text: Yet another stop on my quest for amazing bbq since moving here and leaving my backyard and smoker behind.  I'm generally disappointed but Midwood was a pleasant surprise.  Of the dozen or so places I've tried in and around Charlotte, Midwood is probably the best but the ribs are still just ok, no char, no amazing dry rub and sauces that are moderate when it comes to flavor.  The vibe of the restaurant is laid back, has a nice neighborhood feel, the menu has all the bqq joint classics and a few surprises as well.  The staff are courteous and efficient which probably helps since Midwood obviously deals with a great deal of volume.  If I have guests who want bbq I'll likely take them here but I still dream of finding an old dude in a shack with ribs that make me weep.

nYNtwu1ZjmrEH5VEMyhabw.text: A fun place for BBQ. Nice southern style traditional food. Do not go here if you are watching your calories. Finding a healthy option is nearly impossible.

d7prsrxFmBQ02nvmQDRw9w.text: The food was incredible (pork sandwich, and the caramelized brisket called "burnt ends") and our waiter was fantastic.  We will definitely visit every time we are in Charlotte.

DLWCYOJfb-BENEQ3UgLCkg.text: What a great local resultant. Parking is a bit tricky, but otherwise everything else is spot on. Had the brisket and another night the rib and chicken combo. Both great. Service was on good as well. We do plan to return for sure.

QHjZvZnCFyqQ_1VCMALfXA.text: The food here was surprising very very good. I've eaten here a few times and I enjoy every visit.

-6izgV6xzeVfJc9GoGFRzA.text: Food: I think this is the best BBQ place in Charlotte. Definitely get the banana pudding.   Service: docked two stars. We ate here on Halloween - some of my friends are from out of town so I was excited to have them experience some Carolina BBQ. We were seated quickly and ordered drinks and food at the same time. Food came quickly. However our waitress made sporadic appearances with prolonged absences. She brought our food and left without asking if we needed anything else...and we did...she didn't bring any silverware. Our friend had to get up and go to the bar to ask for silverware. when she did appear we asked for a side of sauce. Fast forward 15 minutes...we already finished eating and she brought our sauce.  An unfortunate experience. I generally love this place and will come back for the food but don't expect the service that a five star worthy restaurant should have.

Nyo1iibCz6H_mfFnIZB2mQ.text: All I have to say is wow! I had family in town this weekend and my mom wanted real southern BBQ.  Found Midwood Smokehouse on yelp and so glad we went!  The good was delish!   I got the beef, my son had ribs, and my parents had a combo platter.  Everything we had was exceptional.  Our server Brian was fantastic!   He gave us recommendations on the food an

PtgAGmOpts2EyBSUcVFVbA.text: Consistently delicious and perfectly cooked. Love the mac n cheese and brisket. Awesome!!

fNlcKJHpIvtoV7XpRtSniw.text: Great food! Their brisket is some of the best in town. And they've got great sides and specials. Good beer selection too! No, seriously...get the brisket. Lean, fatty, or mixed. I prefer mixed. I've always had awesome service too.

vJ1Z373n9qmh0ED0OJKQAg.text: I came here because of a recommendation from my boyfriend. Excellent food, excellent service. As soon as we walked in we were politely greeted by the hostess. Although we were told the wait would be 20 minutes, it only ended up being 10! Our waitress was attentive and was helpful in menu decisions. I settled with the Carolina Pork BBQ small plate. It was delicious! The portion was a lot larger than I would have expected. I will definitely come here again.

KY7N18LDQvcILMfdYxTVtg.text: I am ruined for BBQ. I will never eat BBQ at another restaurant in this city. The pimento cheese fries are a must. Also be a fat kid and order a side of the baked beans and dump those bad boys on there. Do it. For real. I would start listing things that are good here but I would start at the planter near the door. I love it all. Eat here as soon as possible if you haven't already. Burnt ends are a must for first timers.
